title: @RiotRepertoir
body: I'm still waiting for these fizz buffs.{{champion:105}}

replies.body:
Did I, or someone else, promise Fizz buffs?

Isn't that guy already really strong?
Luk... I mean Repertoir don't listen the dark side of the boards

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1nN6XIuq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-10T18:05:29.702+0000)
>
> Did I, or someone else, promise Fizz buffs?
> 
> Isn't that guy already really strong?
i hate fizz he's like tahm he doesnt need buffs!

He is perfectly fine where he is (at least ap Fizz). If you are waiting for buffs you will be disappointed. Actually i fear he will get gutted like it happened in 5.2 just because of this stupid bruiser Fizz. Ap Fizz don't deserve direct nerfs (ad does however).
He just needs his base damage lowered and AP scaling increased like Ekko.
Ap fizz definitely needs a bit of love
Just nerf his stupid %health damage and he's balanced.
fizz is fine learn to play him silly
